item.title: Mounting and unmounting with dmenu
item.author: Author
item.description: Mounting and unmounting with dmenu Mounting devices with the mount command is a hassle, at least for me. To mount devices with the mount command you need to be root but if you use any kind of file manager to mount devices you don’t need to be root. Have you ever wonder why is that. Well it’s simple they use a different kind of command it’s called udiskctl here the help.
